message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18000.
I'm interested in the product, but $18000 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $15000?
I understand that $18000 is a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $16500. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $16500 is still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $14000?
I'm still willing to work with you, Bob. I can offer it to you for $15800. It's a good compromise, and I think you'll really like the product.
I'm getting close to your last offer, but I'm still a bit hesitant. Would you be willing to meet me at $13500?
I'm getting a bit frustrated with the back-and-forth, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway between my last offer and your latest one. I can offer it to you for $14200. It's the best I can do.
I understand your frustration, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $13000?

I've already given you a lot of concessions, Bob. I'm not willing to go any lower than my last offer. I think you're getting a great deal at $14200. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'm going to have to consider other options.
